page.title: 15CLUBS IN KILMERSDON
page.content: JACK AND JILL CLUB - weekly for mothers and children under 5. Babies have supervised play - relaxation for the mothers - help + advice if needed. TUESDAY CLUB - swimming lessons for under 5's in summer. YOUTH CLUBS -own premises now and provides a lively social life for the local children and adolescents on most evenings. WOMEN'S INSTITUTE - monthly. Founded 45 years ago. A very live institute of 46 members, some from the neighbouring towns. A group has undertaken this survey. An annual Produce & Handicraft Show takes place in the Courtroom. THE BRITISH LEGION - like national - helps ex-service personnel, organising Poppy Day collections and Remembrance Day Parades. SOCIAL CLUB - Fund raising efforts during the year give outings for older residents + children. Xmas dinner + childrens Xmas party.
